title: My first music video
brief_description: Shows how to make simple musical instruments from everyday materials using step by step instructions. Includes shakers, tambourines, drums, bells, xylophone, triangle, pan pipes, banjo and harp.
description: Shows how to make simple musical instruments from everyday materials using step by step instructions. Includes shakers, tambourines, drums, bells, xylophone, triangle, pan pipes, banjo and harp.
